summary: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and uncovering his greatest personal challenge yet.
cast: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|John S. Battle|Larry Bird|Joe Bryant|Kobe Bryant|Derek Fisher|Chick Hearn|Dennis Johnson|Magic Johnson|Michael Jordan|Vanessa Laine Bryant|Destry Mushtare|Stephen A. Smith|Jerry West|J.A. Adande|Drew Carey|Clyde Drexler|Julius Erving|Kevin Garnett|Pau Gasol|Jim Gray|Phil Jackson|Karl Malone|Shaquille O'Neal|Lamar Odom|John Stockton|Hannah Storm|Bill Walton
title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
